CustomField.description: Goal is prorated to 25% when % to Appt Goal Actual is at least 100% and doesn't have a Surveys Collected Additional Guarantee.
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(to_Appt_Goal_Actual__c >=1, NOT( INCLUDES( Additional_Guarantees__c , "Surveys Collected"))), Monthly_Survey_Goal__c*(75/100), Monthly_Survey_Goal__c)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Goal is prorated to 25% when % to Appt Goal Actual is at least 100% and doesn't have a Surveys Collected Additional Guarantee.
CustomField.label: Survey Goal Formula
